doc.title: Zespri Kiwifruit: Original Recipes by Ieatishootipost!
doc.text: The/DT Zespri/NN Kiwifruit/NN Season/NN is/VBZ now/RB well/RB and/CC truly/JJ underway/NN and/CC I/PRP have/VB been/VBN asked/VBD to/TO be/VB Zespri/JJ Ambassador/NN for/IN the/DT 2009/NN Season/NN ./. As/IN part/NN of/IN my/PRP$ duties/NN ,/, I/PRP had/VBD to/TO come/VB up/RP with/IN three/CD original/JJ Kiwifruit/NN recipes/NN for/IN the/DT media/NN launch/NN which/WRB I/PRP am/VBP posting/VBG here/RB for/IN everyone/NN to/TO try/VB at/IN home/NN ./. As/IN I/PRP am/VBP more/JJ of/IN a/DT home/NN chef/NN rather/RB than/IN a/DT professional/JJ chef/NN ,/, you/PRP will/MD find/VB that/IN these/DT are/VBP really/RB simple/JJ recipes/NN that/WDT anyone/PRP can/MD do/VB at/IN home/NN with/IN ingredients/NNS that/WDT are/VBP easily/RB available/JJ from/IN the/DT supermarket/NN ./. I/PRP hope/VBP you/PRP can/MD try/VB them/PRP at/IN home/NN and/CC let/VB us/PRP know/VB what/WP you/PRP think/VBP ./.
